page.title: 03Local Bus and Train Services
page.content: Through the village of Hill of Beath runs a local bus service from Dunfermline to Ballingry.Usually double-decker buses run on this route at 15-20min. intervals.This bus travels up Main Street and then along Woodend Place and then onto Cowdenbeath.People can also catch buses to Edinburgh and Kirkcaldy on the A910 road just to the S.E. of Hill of Beath.There is a railway station in the centre of Cowdenbeath with services to Edinburgh but many of the services have been cut in the past few years.The train stops at Dunfermline,Rosyth,Inverkeithing,North Queensferry and Dalmeny on it's route.
